ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), or( Owner_Estimate_Q1__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q2__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q3__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q4__c <> 0 ), Opportunity_SBU__c = "D&S" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: D&S can only use Annual Estimate.
